abstract: In a speech, Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano took on critics of the administration's immigration policies on both the left and right.
snippet: In a speech, Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano took on critics of the administration's immigration policies on both the left and right.
lead_paragraph: In a blunt speech on Wednesday, Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano took on critics of the administration's immigration policies on both the left and right, telling Republicans that security along the border with Mexico is "at an apex" and rejecting calls from immigrant advocacy groups to slow the pace of deportations.

headline.main: Janet Napolitano Takes on Critics of Immigration
